```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
```

## Aim

Make synthetic community to calibrate CASEU-OD bias

## Materials

- Agar plates


```{r}
isolates <- fread(here::here("data/output/isolates.csv"))
pairs <- fread(here::here("data/output/pairs.csv"))
pairs_melted <- fread(here::here("data/output/pairs_melted.csv"))
```

```{r}
set.seed(12345)
isolates %>%
    filter(Family == "Enterobacteriaceae", !grepl("JVN", ExpID)) %>%
    slice(sample(n(), 2, replace = F))
```

```{r}
pairs_melted %>%
    filter(RawDataType == "Sanger") %>%
    distinct(Community, Isolate1, Isolate2)
```
